messages.content: Dear Voter, We must leave the Single Market and Customs Union in order that we can be FREE to make our OWN TRADE DEALS with the rest of the world and end free movement of people. We can offer the EU a free trade deal. If elected I will never support any concession which might allow Human Rights provisions (incorporated into the Lisbon Treaty) being used to prevent foreign criminals being removed from our country. The decision must be made according to our own law. Vote UKIP to show your support for a CLEAN BREXIT.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports a clean break from the EU by leaving the Single Market and Customs Union to free the UK to make its own trade deals and end free movement; opposes Human Rights provisions that could hinder removal of foreign criminals.

issues.brexitEurope: Supports leaving the Single Market and Customs Union; against concessions tied to the Lisbon Treaty that affect immigration enforcement.
issues.immigration: Intends to end free movement of people and ensure foreign criminals can be removed according to UK law.
